p.d: Stevie Wonder, Carole King and Take That headline at London’s iconic Hyde Park. Stevie Wonder and his band bring an epic, soulful show and Carole King performs songs from her seminal album "Tapestry." A spectacular, confetti-packed show from Take That alongside performances from pop-alchemist Pharrell Williams, chart-topping Olly Murs, blues rock band Alabama Shakes and The Eagles’ Don Henley make this a truly unforgettable show.
